name: Trump Hoverboard Sim - Mannequin Race Challenge
name_original: Trump Hoverboard Sim - Mannequin Race Challenge
description:
Trump is riding his killer glider across the city on his hoverboard in this simulator. Beat everyone's score! Watch him fall

[How to play]
- Tap left and right to move while trump does the running man on his hoverboard
- Avoid cars and obstacles

More coming soon!
